InstalledItem.Name: CF-557 Galdereen Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 5

With a bite as fearsome as its fanged namesake, the Klaus & Werner CF-557 Galdereen laser repeater is a solid choice for a wide range of vehicles thanks to its high rate of fire and consistent efficacy.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it aint broke, dont fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though its slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenants dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.
